title: kSIrAbdi kannike
sahitya:
(rAgA: kurinji)   
  kSIrAbdi kannike shrI mahAlakSmI (yArige vaduvAguvE) nInu (yArigE vaduvAguvE)


caraNam 1    sharadhi bandhana rAmachndra mUrtigo paramAtma shrI ananta padmanAbhagO
sarasijanAbha shrI janArdhana mUrtigO ubhayakAvEri (or eraDu hoLeya) ranga paTTaNadarasago (yArigE)
 caraNam 2  (rAgA:  yamunAkalyANi)Aa:S R2 G3 P M2 P D2 S  Av:  S D2 P M2 P G3 R2 S  cheluva mUruti bElura chennigarAyanigO keLadi heLuDupiya shrI krSNarAyanigO
iLeyoLu pANDuranga (or paNDarapura) viTThalarAyagO (or viTTalEsagO) naLinAkSi hELamma badari nArAyaNagO (yArigE)
 caraNam 3  (rAga:  kAnaDA).  malayajagandi bindu mAdhavarAyagO sulabha dEva puruSOttamagO
phaladAyaka nitya maNgaLa nAyakagO cheluve nacade pELu shrI venkaTEshagO (yArigE)
 caraNam 4  (rAgA:  sindhubhairavi)Aa:S R2 G2 M1 G2 P D1 N2 S  Av:  N2 D1 P M1 G2 R1 S N2 S  vAsavArcita kancI varadarAjanigO A sura vandya shrImuSNadAdi varAhanigO
 shESashAyiyAda shrI ranganAyakagO sAsira nAmadoDeya aLagirIshagO (yArigE)
 caraNam 5  (rAga:  maNirangu)Aa:S R2 M1 P N2 S  Av:  S N2 P M1 G2 R2 S  sharaNAgataranu poreva sArangapANigO varagaLa nIva shrInivAsa mUrtiagO
gurukulantaka rAjagOpAla mUrtigO sthiravAda purandara viTTalarAyanigO (yArigE)
